posts.raw_content:
After yet another angry private note from an atheist pede who is accusing me of "theocratizing MAGA" for commenting on a post about Islam, it is time to set the record straight.

1. Christianity is "not of this world" (John 18:36). Jesus did not set up or favor any political system. Christianity thrives in any governmental system, because a Christian's highest loyalty is to God, not man. Islam **is** a political system. It is both a religion and a government (Sharia).

2. Christianity has assurance of salvation. *Anyone* who confesses with his mouth Christ Jesus and believes in his heart that God raised Him from the dead is saved (Romans 10:9-10). This means saved from sin in this world and eternal death in hell. This means the joys of heaven and the restored world. Islam has no such promise. In Islam, Allah has a limited number he will promise Jannah. Nobody knows who they are, and Allah is free to be as capricious as he wants. 

3. In Christianity, nobody earns heaven. It's a free gift (Ephesians 2:8-9). In Islam, you earn a better chance--but no guarantee--of Jannah by dying as a "martyr" in a holy war against infidels. Yes, blowing yourself up on a bus *is no guarantee of reaching Jannah in Islam.* This is one of the most pernicious misunderstandings among Western atheists. They do not understand how desperate Muslims are to get a few extra points because there is *no way of knowing whether you have earned enough points to reach Jannah.* If you don't, off to Jahannam you go.

4. In Christianity, men and women are both honored. In heaven, there is no difference between men and women (Mark 12:25, Galatians 3:28). The excesses of Western feminism are a distortion of the Bible's message about equality between the sexes. We have different roles, but the same value. In Islam, the best a woman can hope for, if she is lucky and Allah is graceful, is to be a sex slave to her husband in Jannah. That's it. She'll be competing for his affections with his other *houris* (which can be women, little boys, or weird spiritual beings) for the rest of time. If he gets tired of her there, he can snap his fingers and she'll be tossed out into Jahannam. There she'll be burned to a crisp and cease to exist. Not suffer eternally, just disappear. That's how little she's worth. She can be un-existed on a whim of her dead husband.

5. Freedom of religion (including *from* it) is unique to Christian countries because ours is a faith of an internal kingdom, not an external one. Hindus and Muslims can't tolerate one another. That's why they split into India *and* Pakistan. Even one flavor of Muslim can't tolerate another. That's why they further split Pakistan into Pakistan and Bangladesh. Atheist states like China and North Korea demand atheist obeisance to the government and do not tolerate any faith in public. Only Christianity allows for pluralistic societies where all can be free to live out their faith in public - including atheists.

On everything that matters, Christianity and Islam are polar opposites. Stop pretending that you can have Western civilization without Christianity. Everything from the value of human life to the shape of the nuclear family is a product of Christianity, and Islam is the antithesis of every single one of those things.
posts.author: BoricuaPede
posts.title: Islam and Christianity are not "equivalent" - setting the record straight for atheist pedes
